title: Trainee Tea Buyer
snippet: A rare opportunity to launch a career at the heart of the tea industry. Learn the art and science of tea tasting and the global supply chain. Salary: Â£30k.

description.intro: Join one of the world's leading beverage companies. As a Trainee Tea Buyer, you'll become an integral part of the Tea Buying & Blending team. After five years of dedicated training, you'll be ready to manage your own origin.
responsibilities: Taste up to 300 teas, fruit and herbal blends per day.
Support Buyers/Assistant Buyers in the procurement process.
Analyse market trends and contribute to contract negotiations.
